title: How long does it take to fully charge my TalkBand B2?
answer:
Your TalkBand B2 requires approximately 1.5 hours for a full charge. The battery icon on the TalkBand B2 screen indicates the current charging status. When your TalkBand B2 is fully charged, the battery icon will stop blinking. 

 Your TalkBand B2 supports the following charging voltages and currents: 5 V 0.5 A, 5 V 1 A, 5 V 1.5 A, and 5 V 2 A.
